title: Design and Experimental Validation of a UAV Platform
description: In this project, a 7-inch Crocodile frame drone was customized by designing and producing in 3D components such as landing gear and mounts for the RealSense T265 camera, Jetson Nano, PX4 6C flight controller, and ESCs. A Visual-Inertial Odometry (VIO) localization solution was integrated, enabling the drone to estimate its position indoors where GPS signals and external motion capture systems are unavailable. The work encompassed both hardware and software aspects, ensuring stable and accurate flight performance even without external references.

details.challenge: Enabling reliable indoor flight of a customized UAV without access to GPS or external motion capture systems.
details.solution: Designed and integrated custom 3D-printed components to mount onboard devices (Jetson Nano, PX4 flight controller, ESC, RealSense T265) and implemented VIO-based localization for autonomous indoor navigation.
